content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm sure it's a lovely place, but I'm afraid we have to discuss the rental price. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I get the best possible return on my investment. So, what is your proposed rental price for this 25-square-meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible, but I am willing to negotiate. How much are you looking for?

I am also looking for a reliable and responsible tenant, so please let me know if you have any experience in paying rent on time.

Thank you for considering me as a tenant. I hope we can come to an agreement on the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must admit that I have a certain price in mind. I'm looking for a rental price that will allow me to maximize my returns on investment while still being fair to the tenant. Could you please provide me with a specific rental price that you're willing to consider?

As for your inquiry about my experience as a landlord, I can assure you that I have a long history of renting out properties and have always received timely payments from my tenants. I take my responsibilities as a landlord very seriously and expect the same from my tenants. So, if you're looking for a reliable and responsible landlord, I believe I'm the right person for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that you have a certain price in mind, but I am willing to negotiate. If you could provide me with your proposed rental price, I would be happy to discuss it further.

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to be a reliable and responsible landlord. I have a history of paying rent on time and I hope to continue this pattern in the future.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. While I can't disclose the exact rental price that I have in mind at this stage, I can assure you that it will be competitive within the local market. I take my responsibilities as a landlord very seriously and want to make sure that I get the best possible return on my investment while still being fair to the tenant.

I appreciate your history of paying rent on time and I hope that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and we can continue the negotiation from there.
name: Heinrich Heine
